mapper.select: select o.id, c.username, w.name as worker_name, w.id as worker_id, g.good_name, g.price, o.status, o.create_time, k.name as kinds_name from `order` o left join consumer_user c on c.id = o.user_id left join worker w on w.id = o.worker_id left join goods g on g.id = o.goods_id left join kinds k on k.id = g.kinds_id where o.user_id = #{userId} order by create_time desc
